description: The story of the pictures we have taken and where they have taken us.
name: American Photography: A Century of Images

original_info.id: American Photography: A Century of Images_1999
original_info.name: American Photography: A Century of Images

review.name: An excellent documentary
review.reviewBody: As a person with no interest in the history of photography, I nearly skipped this movie, expecting it to be... well, boring. I was wrong. The documentary is extremely captivating. It lasts 3 hours and it manages to grab the viewer's attention and hold it without letting it go. The movie is simply too brisk to become boring in such a short period. It displays an immense amount of photographs and videos, accompanied by educational and insightful comments from direct witnesses, authors, and various photographic experts. I highly recommend you to take this journey through history - you will not regret it.
